post:
**Pulsed Media Black Friday + Cyber Week Specials Of 2020**

We got some nice recurring and compoundable deals going on! Compounding means you can take annual discount and combine it with the black friday deal :)
There will also be new deals by Monday for the Cyber Week and there will be some new ones even before that! Black Friday deals will by end of Sunday, and Cyber week deals will be released shortly after.__

All of the specials are listed at http://pulsedmedia.com/specials.php


**_Highlighted Specials For LET!_**

All of these are recurring and you can combine these with long term payments as well. These are only highlights for LET which fit into LET rules :) ... i also think there will be more of shared seedboxes before cyber week begins ... ;) For cyber week we are considering an week long auction.


**Managed Dediseedboxes**
You can change these to full dedi as well on Power+ service level, or just SUDO (Debian10+Seedbox software installed) with Power service level.

 * F19-MDS-XEON-12T: Intel Xeon L5630, 36GB ECC RAM, 1Gbps Network, 100TB Traffic. [~~49.99€~~ 39.99€ Per Month](http://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=226&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=2020-bfriday-mdsmonthly20) (Only one remains at the time of posting!)
 * F19-MDS-32T: Opteron 6core, 24GB ECC RAM, 1Gbps Network, 100TB Traffic. [~~69.99€~~ 55.99€ Per Month](http://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=224&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=2020-bfriday-mdsmonthly20)

**Shared Seedboxes**

 * Value250 S: 1TB RAID5 Storage, 1Gbps servers but 100/250Mbps Torrents, 6 000GiB Torrent Traffic. [~~6.49€~~ 5.19€ Per Month](http://pulsedmedia.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=193&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=2020-bfriday-value250)


Check them all out at: https://pulsedmedia.com/specials.php Price updates on checkout page.


Included are:

 * rTorrent / ruTorrent  +  Deluge
 * Public trackers allowed
 * HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, LFTP, SSH access
 * sonarr, pyload, flexget, rclone, resilio, syncthing, btsync (1.4 and 2.2), ffmpeg, fuse (unionfs, sshfs, s3fs etc.) etc.
 * [Very Strong Privacy Policy](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Privacy_Policy)
 * [14-day full moneyback guarantee](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Refunds_Policy)
 * [Standard seedbox Service Level Agreement(SLA)](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Seedbox_SLA_Policy)
 * [Free Bonus Disk Quota](http://wiki.pulsedmedia.com/index.php/Pulsed_Media_Free_Bonus_Disk_Policy)
 * **Setup is INSTANT**


Extra info:

 * [Green Datacenter operations](http://blog.pulsedmedia.com/2017/04/steady-progress-green-operations/)
 * Datacenter Location: Helsinki, Finland
 * Some latency metrics: 20ms DECIX, 36ms OVH, 38ms Online, 0.4-0.6ms Cloudflare, 31ms Leaseweb, 36ms Redstation (UK), 23ms Hetzner (DE), 23ms Serverloft/PlusServer
 * [Terms Of Service](http://pulsedmedia.com/terms%20and%20conditions.pdf)


*Payment methods*

 * Paypal
 * IBAN/SEPA Wiretransfers
 * Crypto (BTC, LTC, XMR, ETH, DOGE and many others.)
